name: Dead or Alive (Lurking Beneath)
description:
This is Dead or Alive! AKA 'Lurking Beneath'. Our game for the 'Pizza Jam 3' Game jam. This is it..! the game you've all been waiting for! 

You are a tiny fish making your way up the food chain, eat other fish or be eaten collect blood to upgrade to a bigger better fish earn blood by eating other fish. Hunt or be hunted.. The choice is yours..

Key Features
  • Buy new and exciting fish
  • Explore the large, open world.
  • Lots of fish and people to murder!
  • Huge whale to eat anything and everything! (Apart from jellyfish :p ) 
  • Spend your hard-earned blood in the shop!

Credits

Programming -  Callan Hansen

Art - Kara Hansen

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Piskel
  • Bosca Ceoil
In Near Future

In the near future we plan on doing a remake of this game. We're gonna overhaul the graphics, fix the bugs in this game, and even add more fish and possibly more maps! Be on the lookout for it!
